meanings.definition: A type of sauce made from fermented soybeans.
meanings.sent1: I added a splash of soys to my stir-fry for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The soys added a savory taste to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The soys in the pantry were feeling adventurous and decided to join the party in the wok.
meanings.sent4: The soys danced on my taste buds like a flavorful symphony.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the soys filled the kitchen, making my mouth water in anticipation.

meanings.definition: Plural form of soy, referring to the beans themselves.
meanings.sent1: I bought a bag of soys to make tofu at home.
meanings.sent2: The soys were used to make various soy products.
meanings.sent3: The soys rolled off the shelf and onto the kitchen floor, causing a bean avalanche.
meanings.sent4: The soys were like tiny nutritious gems waiting to be cooked.
meanings.sent5: The soys soaked up the marinade, ready to be transformed into a delicious meal.

meanings.sent1: The farmers harvested the soys from the fields.
meanings.sent2: The market sold fresh soys for cooking.
meanings.sent3: The soys whispered secrets to each other in the soybean field.
meanings.sent4: The soys were like little green pearls in the pod.
meanings.sent5: The soys rattled in the container, eager to be used in a recipe.
